name: Edge Hunter
description:
Edge Hunter is a hard to beat, 3D action FPP.

Play as a corporation agent chasing a robot that escapes with company's secret data. Jump from one skyscraper to another and use your monokatana to move through the city defying the laws of gravity. Use cybernetic implants to improve your reflex.

W, S, A, D - move

Shift - run

Space - jump

Left Mouse Button - Use monoblade on the walls marked with 'Cut Here' and 'This Way' neons

Space + W, A or D - Launch yourself off the wall while preforming wallrun.

Right Mouse Button - CyberVision

'+' or '-' - adjust mouse sensitivity
